text: Pleasant Groves is a town in Jackson County, Alabama, United States. It was incorporated on February 17, 1993.James Kaetz, "Pleasant Groves," Encyclopedia of Alabama, 12 June 2017. As of the 2020 census, the population of the town was 426. This town is not to be confused with Pleasant Grove. == References == Category:Towns in Alabama
title: Pleasant Groves, Alabama
